meanings.definition: The quality or state of being incredible.
meanings.sent1: The incrediblenesses of the magic show amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her stories were full of incrediblenesses that left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The incrediblenesses of the talking animals in the movie made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The incrediblenesses of nature's beauty can be seen in every sunset.
meanings.sent5: The incrediblenesses of the superhero's powers saved the city from disaster.

meanings.sent1: The bookshelves were filled with many incrediblenesses.
meanings.sent2: She admired the incrediblenesses of the artwork displayed in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The incrediblenesses of the desserts at the party were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: His collection showcased the incrediblenesses of different cultures around the world.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed the incrediblenesses of ancient civilizations for all to see.
